item.title: Natural-Gas Firm Diversified Energy Strikes Deal for Permian Basin Player
item.description: Maverick Natural Resources has operations in Texas and Oklahoma.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Sinks in AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: Nvidia and other U.S. chip stocks tumbled premarket, and futures pointed to one of the worst days for the Nasdaq-100 index in years.

item.title: Metal Prices Mixed; Copper Slides on Lower Chinese Factory Activity
item.description: Base metal prices were mixed, with copper down as Chinese manufacturing activity contracts to August lows.

item.title: What's New This Tax Season That Can Save You Money
item.description: There are some new wrinkles, especially for those who sell things online or bought an EV.

item.title: Chinese Investors With Few Options Turn to Dividends
item.description: Companies with good payouts are now the hottest bet in China markets.
